item.title: You can fix 5e!
item.description: Let’s start with some background – I’ve taken a somewhat unusual route to arrive here. Technically, the first RPG I was exposed to was D&D 3E, but the first RPG I actually read and fell in love with was Risus. Note that Risus has a drastically different approach to mechanics and style compared to other traditional RPG’s: it’s a rules-light comedy game. Despite almost zero experience with running games, I printed out its six pages and had an incredible session on a camping trip with crazy, collaborative worldbuilding.
